meanings.sent1: She grouched about the rainy weather all day.
meanings.sent2: He always grouched when things didn't go his way.
meanings.sent3: The cat grouched at the closed door, wanting to go outside.
meanings.sent4: The old car grouched as it struggled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The child's constant grouching made everyone tired of listening.

meanings.sent1: The grouched customer demanded a refund for the faulty product.
meanings.sent2: She had a grouched expression on her face throughout the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The grouched cat refused to play with its toys.
meanings.sent4: The grouched tone of his voice made it clear he was not happy.
meanings.sent5: The grouched look in her eyes warned others to approach with caution.
